plot outline: This is the story of two orphaned college students who make ends meet by doing odd jobs at night. Nonetheless, at college, they pretend to be have rich parents abroad. Their life takes a dramatic turn when they learn that the new principal might be one of their mother!
title: Nammal
plot: Two youngsters, who are orphan. Grown up themselves,by their hardwork. Gets to know that their teacher is one of their mom.

This is the story of two orphaned college students who make ends meet by doing odd jobs at night. Nonetheless, at college, they pretend to be have rich parents abroad. Their life takes a dramatic turn when they learn that the new principal might be one of their mother!::Abijit Radhakrishna
